sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment features of pulmonary heart disease caused by tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肺结核所致肺心病的诊断和治疗特点。

sentences.english: Heart myositis and lobar anxiety patient are sensitive to strong heart glucoside, should notice dosage.
sentences.chinese: 心肌炎及肺心病患者对强心甙敏感，应注意用量。

sentences.english: Thus, PDE technique is useful for early diagnosis of Cot Pulmonale.
sentences.chinese: 因此，PDE技术对于肺心病的早期诊断是有价值的。

sentences.english: Cor blimey I better get the defrag right.
sentences.chinese: 肺心病啊呀我还是得到整理的权利。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of combination therapy with yueanxin and phentolamine in patients with chronic pulmonary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察悦安欣联合酚妥拉明治疗肺心病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Hemodynamic changes in 90 patients with pulmonary hypertension secondary to chronic cor pulmo-nale were reported.
sentences.chinese: 对肺心病90例患者进行血流动力学观察。

sentences.english: Pulmonary heart disease in the whole course of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 在肺心病的整个治疗过程中。

sentences.english: The thyroid hormone levels of 41 patients with onset pulmonary heart disease were measured in this study.
sentences.chinese: 分析41例肺心病急性加重期患者的甲状腺激素水平。

pinyin: man4 xing4 zu3 se4 xing4 fei4 bing4

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
